name: Bee Bomb
description:
Must be passed to another player at night

Explosion timer set by the @{role:Bee Keeper}, between 2-4 nights

Kills the player holding it when it explodes

Holder has a 50% chance to learn how many nights remain until it explodes

name: Crystal Ball
description:
Each night, the holder may select another player

Upon the death of the holder, the last selected player's role will be revealed

May choose No One and will default to that if no player is chosen

A broken crystal ball does nothing

name: Dreamcatcher
description:
Passively checks for visitors at night

At the start of each day, the holder will be given a system message telling them the name of each player who visited them the night before

If no one visited, or if the dreamcatcher is broken, the holder will be told that they were not visited

name: Fruit
description:
Does nothing

Can be an apple, banana, orange, strawberry, lemon, pear, or pineapple (preferably)

name: Gun
description:
May choose a target during the day to kill

Unless otherwise stated, guns have a 50% chance to announce the name of the holder when used

A broken gun will backfire and kill the holder

name: Immunity Idol
description:
May be used during the day before the voting period has ended to make all votes against the holder not count

May be given to another player at night

A broken immunity idol does nothing

name: Knife
description:
May choose a target during the day to stab. The target will bleed and will die at the end of the day.

Both the holder's and the target's names will be announced.

A broken knife does nothing.

name: Skyrim
description:
Does nothing

Can be played on so many different platforms!

name: Suit
description:
The wearer does not know they are wearing a suit.

A suit disguises the wearer as another role, and they will reveal as that other role on death. The role is chosen by the @{role:Tailor} who gives it to them.

A broken suit does nothing.

name: Taser
description:
May choose a player during the day to tase. The player will be roleblocked and cannot visit other players during the following night.

Both the holder's and the player's names will be announced.

A broken taser will instead roleblock the holder.

name: TNT
description:
When detonated, kills the holder and hides their role

Holder does not know if they are holding it

Does nothing if broken

name: Vest
description:
Passively protects the wearer from being targeted for a kill once, and the wearer will receive a system message when the vest is used up.

A broken vest does nothing and will not protect the wearer.

name: Will
description:
Holder may write on the Will at night

Upon the holder’s death, reveals the Will’s contents to all players

A broken Will reveals blank

name: Wish
description:
Once per game at night, the holder may choose to visit and investigate, protect, or kill another player

A broken Wish will show opposite alignments on investigations, not protect, or backfire when killing and kill the holder
